channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Point-set games and functions with the hereditary small oscillation property
item.description: arXiv:2405.15263v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Given a metric space $X$, we consider certain families of functions $f:X\to\mathbb{R}$ having the hereditary oscillation property HSOP and the hereditary continuous restriction property HCRP on large sets. When $X$ is Polish, among them there are families of Baire measurable functions, $\overline{\mu}$-measurable functions (for a finite nonatomic Borel measure $\mu$ on $X$) and Marczewski measurable functions. We obtain their characterizations using a class of equivalent point-set games. In similar aspects, we study cliquish functions, SZ-functions and countably continuous functions.
item.dc:creator: Marek Balcerzak, Tomasz Natkaniec, Piotr Szuca
